## TGl1EntityRenderer type

Webgl1 renderer, without extensions by default.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TGl1EntityRenderer<TExts extends TGlExtensionKeys> = TGlEntityRenderer<WebGLRenderingContext, TExts>;
```
